title: The Lion King
synopsis: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

title: Frozen II
synopsis: Anna, Elsa, Kristoff, Olaf and Sven leave Arendelle to travel to an ancient, autumn-bound forest of an enchanted land. They set out to find the origin of Elsa's powers in order to save their kingdom.

title: Finding Dory
synopsis: Friendly but forgetful blue tang Dory begins a search for her long-lost parents, and everyone learns a few things about the real meaning of family along the way.
